analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MoldCoinBonus.buyForFriend (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#364-391):
	External calls:
	- tokens = safeMul(msg.value,fundAddress.price(block.timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#367)
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(friend) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#368-374)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(friend) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#368-374)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#380-385)
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#386-387)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#376-379)

Reentrancy in MoldCoinBonus.buyWithBonus (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#345-364):
	External calls:
	- tokens = safeMul(msg.value,fundAddress.price(block.timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#349-350)
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#351-355)

	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#351-355)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#359-360)
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#360-362)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#357-359)

MoldCoin.price (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#196-210) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeInSeconds < startDatetime (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#196-197)
	- timeInSeconds <= firstStageDatetime (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#197-202)
	- timeInSeconds <= endDatetime (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#205-208)
	- timeInSeconds <= secondStageDatetime (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#202-204)

MoldCoin.buyRecipient (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#220-240) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#225-226)

MoldCoin.allocateFounderTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#241-254) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#242-244)

MoldCoin.arrangeUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#287-309) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#289)
	- require(bool)(balances[holder] > 0) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#298)
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#291-294)

MoldCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#136)
MoldCoin.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#135)
MoldCoin.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#136)

	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/38/0x3d34cc988d583dd2757acaa18a1e90cfab8b7b1d.sol#1): it allows old versions
